text: Atahpara tadera iddata puranera kala asanna hale tomara haya yathabidhi taderake rekhe debe, na haya taderake parityaga karabe ebam tomadera madhya theke dujana n'yayaparayana lokake saksi rakhabe; ara tomara allahara jan'ya sathika saksya debe. E dbara tomadera madhye ye ke'u allaha o sesa dibasera upara imana rakhe take upadesa deya hacche. Ara ye ke'u allahara taka'oya abalambana kare allaha tara jan'ya (uttaranera) patha kare debena
